S.FORM: = Uzbekistan = Gaga kska Yacow ka Uzbekistan, 41 00 N, 64 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 447,400 sq km(hangan na o Tg57) (knlbanga dxgal o 425,400 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 22,000 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 29,473,614 hiyi. Gaga Tashkent ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 1 idas 9 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Uzbekistan ga wada sugan 62.60% ka dxgal qpahan, 7.70% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 29.70% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Shavkat Mirziyoyev, pnaah hngkawas2016 idas 12 jiyax 14pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' = Ocbek = Ocbek Konghkwo (Kari Ocbek ji Rating: O'zbekiston Respublikasi, ji Sirir: Ўзбекистон Республикаси), splawa dha Ocbek, kiya ka wa mniq Tukcka na qnlhangan kcka dxral, kngkawas 1991 snpeyyah mneyyah Suryeyn dukuricu. Tuiwil hunac Ocbek u tuhuy Turkmen mslutuc, tuhunac u tuhuy Afghan mslutuc, tunarac u tuhuy Tajik mi Kyrgyz mslutuc, tudaya mi tuiwil u msdalih Kazakh, kiya ka knkana qnlangan 2 msdha qnlhangan kcka dxral uri (taxa ka Liectensten), cbiyaw u splawa dha Nniqan Samarhan, yayung Sir mi yayung Ymu ka lmihu knkana tndxral dha, sotu u wa mniq rbuq dxral Fergana, kiya ka knkana Tukcka Asia tqapur balay nniqan. Ocbek ka knkana qnlangan tu6 knbeyhing bay pnyahan wata, kiya u tu7 knbeyhing bay pnyahan king knkana knlangan uri. Rikisi Pusu tyawmu: Rikisi Ocbek. Kngkawas 870 dhuq kngkawas 1212, tuhunac yayung Sir nniqan Sankaku co na tnslutuc sediq Ukus Ahucsiyabu ka pnhiyu Klahan caw (Heyhan) wangcaw qmlahang. Qmlahang tubukuy diyax cida (12 th dhuq 13 th) spuda Siryaw ka kmlawa qmlahang. Kngkawas 1212 dhuq kngkawas 1220, Hhwaccmosa caw (kngkawas 1194 dhuq kngkawas 1220 idas 12) mniq kngkkawas 1210 prading qmlahang Samarhan. Kngkawas 1220 dhuq kngkawas 1388, wada yahan knrmux ngalan Monggolia Tikwo, psnakan ngalan Kingcang Hankwo mi Cahotay Hankwo. Bukuy daw wada yahan knrmux ngalan Teymur. Kngkawas 16 th pnrdingan kngkawas 1506, bukung mpdudul sediq Ocbek Sipanni mquri tuhunac Samarhan nniqan qnpahan pnwalang. Pspoxun niya ka Teymur wangcaw. 17 th, wada ptalax mkdha sunca Puhara Hankwo mi Siwa Hankwo. 18 th, dukuricu ka Hawhan Hankwo. Kngkawas 1873, Puhara Hankwo na Mancit Wangcaw u wada yahan knrmux ngalan Russia Tikwo, wada mnsdan qnlhangan dha. Kngkawas 1918, wada pknglan Tucyeystan Suwiay Syakay Ciyi Konhkwo. Kngkawas 1920 heytay tanah Suryeyn u knrmux ngalan dha ka Siwa Hankwo, pspoxan ka Abud Arahan (Kngkawas 1918 dhuq kngkawas 1920 mniq qmlahang) qnlhangan niya, wada pkngatun ka Siwa Hankwo. Suryeyn ka mniq bukuy dmuwi tndxral dha phiyu Hwaccmo Suwiay Jnmin Konghkwo (qtayi ka Hwaccmo), kngkawas 1924, mrrhak ka Hwaccmo Suwiay Jnmin Konghkwo, tndxral niya u pspuwan Ocbek mi Turkmen ddha tumal Suryeyn konghkwo. Mntna kngkawas idas 10, ida nduma Puhara Hankwo mi nduma Siwa Hankwo ka wada msupu, phiyu Ocbek Suwiay Jnmin Konghkwo, kiya mi tumal Suryeyn. Kngkawas 1991 idas 8 diyax 31 pkla kari dukuricu, knpriyux hangan qnlhangan Ocbek Konghkwo, mntna kngkawas idas 12 diyax 21 tumal Dukuricu Qnlhangan Kwosyey. Ceng-c Binaw, snpeyyah Kari Mohu mniq kngkawas 1991 phyuwan dhuq saya pa, wada mnou prbaun ka diyax snpngan qpahun niya soto, mnniq kngkawas 1995, diyax pnrbawan niya ka kngkawas 2002, kngkawas 2007 mi kngkawas 2015 ka mnlutuc mangal soto dungan, dhuq kngkawas 2016 idas 9 ka wada mrdang. Kngkawas 2002 ka soto seyngkyo cida pa wada mnhdu seyngkyo tubaraw giying mi turuma giying na gying uri, binaw u uka hatay tang ka cida muda niyi. So kiya, kmita ka kwoci kwancaweyn so niya muda seyngkyo wa uxay mndungus bay uuda mincu, mniq mincu csu u mntucay cngti uri. Kngkawas 2016 idas 12 diyax 4, Ocbek u muda snpeyyah mnrdang ka Kari Mohu mn1 soto seyngkyo, cngri Mirceyayehu ka mangal burah soto. Sing-ceng cyu-hwa Pusu tyawmu: Ocbek sngcng cyuhwa. Ocbek pa knkana u psnakan 1 cusyasu, 12 ka co mi 1 cucukonghkwo. Kcka 12 co hangan dha ka spatas truma niyi: Ti-ri Pusu tyawmu: Lnlingay Ocbek. Qtayi: Patas bnkuwan alang mkbrnux Ocbek. Alaw ka mssiyaw qnlhangan niya u to bay qnlhangan kcka dxral kana, so kiya Ocbek u kiya ka knkana qnlangan 2 msdha qnlhangan kcka dxral uri (taxa ka Liectensten). Knkana knrbangan dxral u 44.74 knbkiyan pinhwang km. Knkana hniwan tndxral qnlhangan pa tunarac ka tubaraw ni tuiril ka truma. Dxral brnux u knkana knrbangan niya 80%, to bay wa mniq tuiwil na Kcrkumu bnaqi bbuyu. Tunarac mi tuhunac u mnddwiyaq Tyeynsan mi Csar-Ddwiyaq Alay na kngahu tuiwil, wa kcka niya ka bay hhangan rbuq dxral Fergana mi rbuq dxral Crahusang. Kcka tndxral qnlhangan nniqan ida nkiya cuweyn mttuku mndungus bay dxral ayu. Pusu bay yayung u niqan yayung Amu, yayung Sir mi yayung Cerahusang. Mnkndnguwan bay tarusing kngkkarac. Pndkanan kntlxan idas 7 pa 25℃-32℃, kntlxan diyan tuhunac u knttu dhuq 40℃; pndkanan kntlxan idas 1 u －6～－33℃, knskuy karac tudaya u －38℃. Pndkanan qsiya qnyuxan ka dxral brnux u 80-200 hawmi, nniqan lmiqu u 1000 hawmi, to bay wa mniq misan mi srwasaw cida. Nniqan duma tudaya u msdalih Krmnan Ucilung. Tndxral qnlhangan u to bay wa mniq kcka Kcrkumu bnaqi bbuyu. Knbaraw bay tndxral qnlhangan u kaypa 4643 m na dudux dwiyaq Hacratsutan, kiya ka pusu dudux tudu dwiyaq Cisa. Keyjay Pusu tyawmu: Keyjay Ocbek. Mntna ou bay dukuricu kwosyey keyjayti, keyjay Ocbek mniq knpriyux keyjay ini kpiya knkawas u wada mlih, dhuq kngkawas 1995 bukuy daw prading mtutuy da, wada so niyi mkmalu u snpeyyah dndulan knpriyux cngce prading pndungus. Keyjay ka ptura pqita knrana balay, mniq iyax kngkawas 1998 dhuq kngkawas 2003 kawas kawas mrana 4%, bukuy daw wada ini biyaw knrinah mrana dhuq 7%-8%. Spuda snpuwan pnsliyan qnlangan pila cicin, kngkawas 2008 cida GDP Ocbek u kiya bay so mk2 knrana niya kngkawas 1995 (spuda pskingal neydang smpu). Kngkawas 2003 dhuq cida tongpongryu u inu qdhuq pndkanan 10%. Pndkanan sntkuwan pila kngkawas sediq qnlhangan Ocbek u tikuh balay (Kngkawas 2006 spuda snpuwan pila Amirika cida u 610 pila Amirika, spuda biyax mbari mhnuk smpu u 2250 pila Amirika). So niyi u mniq kcka 209 qnlhangan u tu169 bnkuwan; mniq 12 kcka qnlhangan dukuricu kwosyey pa, wana Kyrgyz mi Tajik na jncyun kokomin nngalan knkana ka mabang kntikuh dhiya (Kngkawas 2006). Pnyahan pkrana keyjay u to bay pssli quri qqiya ddiyun kddiyax. Qnlhangan dha saya daw kiya ka knkana qnlangan tu6 knbeyhing bay pnyahan wata mi tu2 knbeyhing bay cuko wata, knkana qnlangan tu7 knbeyhing pnyahan qnlhangan king. Kiya u qnlhangan dha pa kiya ka nniqan dha hiya stmanan bay gasu ida nkiya, mey, dong, gasoring, ging mi yo pnyahan qnlhangan. Cnduray hari niyi, soto Ocbek Mirceyayehu psdhu matas pusa kari, smkaul ida na qnlhangan jeyking yingkay huku cusi Normamat Tursunoh ka Tasekan su qnlhangan keyjay congcyu cyucang; psdhuwan ida Tasekan co qnlhanga jeyking congcyu cyucang Alimujan Fayicipayehu ka qnlhangan jeyking yingkay huku cusi. Snpuwan knhbrawan hiyi sediq Pusu tyaw: Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Ocbek. Qtayi: Ocbek minjoku Ocbek u knhbrawan balay hiyi sediq mniq Tukcka Asia na qnlhangan, knkana knhbrawan hiyi sediq u 3200 knbkiyan hiyi, ya bay dmka knhbrawan hiyi sediq Tukcka Asia. Pnspuwan kngkawas knhbrawan hiyi sediq Ocbek u wakay balay: 34.1% hiyi sediq u ici khrinas 14 kngkawas (Snpuwan kngkawas 2008). Pusu balay minjoku Ocbek ka Ocbek minjoku (80%), duma minjoku u niqan Tajik joku (5%), Russia joku (2%), Karakarpak joku (2.2%), Korkoc joku (1%), Kazakh joku (3.9%) mi sediq Korean (0.7%). Ocbek u qulung niqan 10% ka biyax mpqpah niya ka wa qnlhangan icil qmpah (Pusu niya balay u wa mniq Russia mi Kazakh) mi duma qnlhangan icil. Hmrinas 15 kngkawas ka sediq udan Ocbek (Snpuwan kngkawas 2003) na mkla smpu patas ryu ka 99.3％, alaw mniq Suryeyn jidayi u dmudul bay quri kyoiku. Knudus dha sediq Ocbek u snaw ka 66 kngkawas, qridin ka 72 kngkawas. Alang mkbrnux Snlhayan snhiyan Pusu tyawmu: Snlhayan snhiyan Ocbek. Islam kyo ka pusu balay slhayan snhiyan Ocbek, mniq jidayi Suryeyn (kngkawas 1921-kngkawas 1991) hmtur kana uuda snlhayan. Piyo keyngkyo congsin mniq kngkawas 2009 cida pkla kingal patas, snluhay muslim ka Ocbek u niqan 93.3%. Kngkawas 2014, Russia Cng pnrhulan na kuriscyang u 7% hiyi knhbrawan. Kngkawas 1990 snpuwan brah u niqan 93,000 hiyi sediq Yodaya mnniq qnlhangan Ocbek. Kari Pusu tyawmu: Kari Ocbek. Kari sduwi seyhu u kari Ocbek mnkcka Tucyey joku na cida kari Kroru, kiya mi tuhuy kari Uighur u niqan mtndadal pnluban dha. Kndadax kngkawas 1992 dhuq cida skari Ocbek ji u dmuwi bntasan kari Latin ji. Mniq 1920 cida brah, kari Ocbek u spatas patas daw splawa dha Turki (tuiwil sediq tmkarac u splawa dha kari Cahotay), dmuwi Persiati matas. Kngkawas 1926, bnkuwan ji Latin u wada ddulun Ocbek, kiya mi mniq kngkawas 1930 jiday muda mnou snbrahan. Mniq kngkawas 1940, ji Sirir u spuda dndulan seyhu Suryeyn, ida ddiyun dhuq mkrhak ka Suryeyn. Kngkawas 1993, Ocbek u tnbrinah knpriyux dmuwi ji Latin (Ji kari Ocbek). Ji niyi u mniq kngkawas 1996 wada sbrahan, kndadax kngkawas 2000 cida ida stusa mniq sapah pyasan. Sapah pyasan u wana tmasa ji Latin kari Ocbek, ana so kari Ocbek ji Sirir saya u wada plaxan mniq ddiyun ppatas bntasan seyhu, binaw ida sduwi bay knou bay sinbung mi wangcan. Pusu bay nniqan dmuwi kari Tajik u mniq dxral 2 hbaraw nniqan Tajik joku: Phara mi Samarhan. Ocbek u niqan hmrinas 80 knbkiyan hiyi sediq u dmuwi kari Kazakh uri. Bungka Pusu tyawmu:Bungka Ocbek. Qtayi: Krasu mi Ocbek Islam kyo. Ocbek u niqan knlbangan bay minjoku mi bungka, pusu minjoku ka Ocbek joku. Kngkawas 1995, ya bay niqan 71% sediq Ocbek pa Ocbek joku kiya. Pusu minjoku u niqan sediq Russia (8%), sediq Tajik (3-4.7%), sediq Kazakh (4%), sediq Tatan (2.5%), kiya mi sediq Karakarpak (2%). Knhbrawan hiyi uxay Ocbek joku na sediq u wisu kndudul mlih, alaw sediq Ocbek snpeyyah cuxan Suryeyn duma nniqan dxral tbrinah miyah, sediq Russia mi minjoku ini khbaraw sediq pa wisu kndudul mlatac icil. Mniq kngkawas 1991 cida dukuricu ka Ocbek, dsediq u slhbun Islam Weyncyawcu Cuyi ka mpkrana knkana Ocbek. Dhuq kngkawas 1994 cida, niqan dmka knhbrawan hiyi Muslim ka Ocbek, mniq kcka snpuwan seyhu pa, Muslim mniq Ocbek u ini khbaraw sediq ka balay bay mkla pnsltudan snlhayan snhiyan. Binaw, jinjya Islan kyo (Muslim) mniq dxral nniqan hiya u muru snlhayan pnsltudan u wisu kndudul mrana. Inggaku Pusu tyawmu: Inggaku Ocbek Tukcka Asia kutyeyn inggaku u splawa dha Sasemukamu, kiya u mniq 16 th thiti mniq Puhara mtqita, cida u alang mkbrnux niyi ka sohu dxral nniqan dha hiya. Sasemukamu mi Yasaypayjanmukamu mi Uighuymukamu u malu balay pnluban dha. Sasemukamu knkana u 6 ini pntna inggaku tyawsu, mntna bay Persia pnsltudan inggaku. Smsung diyax sngayan Pusu tyawmu: Smsung diyax sngayan Ocbek. Bnkuwan diyax ddaun Idas 1 diyax 1: Bnkuwan Qiyax Ddaun Smsung Burah Kngkawas (Yangi Yil Bayrami). Idas 1 diyax 14: Diyax Qmlahang Cukwo (Vatan Himoyachilari kuni). Idas 3 diyax 8: Smsung diyax Qnlangan Qqridin. (Xalqaro Xotin-Qizlar kuni). Idas 1 diyax 21: Smsung Diyax Navroc (Navro'z Bayrami) Idas 5 diyax 9: Diyax Mbiyax (Xotira va Qadirlash kuni). Idas 9 diyax 1: Diyax Dukuricu (Mustaqillik kuni). Idas 10 diyax 1: Smsung Diyax Mptusa (O'qituvchi va Murabbiylar). Idas 12 diyax 8: Diyax Keyngpo (Konstitutsiya kuni). Bnkuwan diyax ddaun Islam Tu1 diyax Idas Sanwaru (Idas 10 diyax 1): Smsung Diyax Kaycay (Ro'za hayiti). Tu10 diyax Idas Turheyco (Idas 12 diyax 10): Smsung diyax Kurpang (Qurbon hayiti). Mmahan mi uuqan Pusu tyawmu: Mmahan mi uuqan Ocbek. Mntna knou bay qnlhangan, wada dndulan dxral nniqan nongyey ka mmahan mi uuqan Ocbek. Ocbek pa niqan knou bay pnhuma pnwalang, niqan pnyahan knou bay pang mi bicun, tukubeycu niya mmahan mi uuqan Ocbek pa 'Mttuku balay bicun'. Kiya Dungan u, hiyi miric ka uqun balay Ocbek uri. Mako uqun Ocbek ka idaw qrapun, ida so idaw balay, pnrmaxan smmalu wawa mi ningjing tnlmuwan mi tama pixil, uqan balay knbeyhing sqrasan pnsliyan. Niqan Dungan ka kingal uqun mdungus bay rmirih Ocbek ka shurpa, spuda hiyi miric mi sama pnspuwan smmalu. Ratyawc ka kingal kluwanan uuqun bicun, malu ngalan pusu uqan; lnhuwan nuduh uri ka qtan bay uuqan Ocbek. Waycyaw Pusu tyawmu: Waycyaw Ocbek. Pnluban dha tuhuy Cyoka Jnmin Konghkwo Pusu tyawmu: Pn. Tna mniq 2000 kngkawas brah cida, spuda elu rudan cbiyaw, Cyokoku mi Ocbek u tna niqan pluban dha da. Kngkawas 1992 idas 1, ddha qnlhangan umuda pwaluk cyeyncyaw, babaw niya daw ida malu bay pnluban dha mi mdhu bay mrana, bukung baraw u kndudul malu pnluban. Kngkawas 2010 u Hucintaw ka mn1 musa qmita Ocbek , kngkawas 2011, kngkawas 2012 Karimohu soto u mn2 musa mita Cyokoku daw, kngkawas 2013 idas 9 Sicinping ka splawa dha miyah Ocbek muda kwosu homung. Ddha dha u wada mrana bay psnhiyi ka quri seyji dha, seyhu dha u mbiyax balay sndhu pddkuh qmlahang pskingal mi mndungus dxral qnlhangan dha; anjeyn msupu qmpah u niqan bay pndungus niya uri, Cyokoku mi Ocbek mniq knbeyhing ddaun seyhu u wada knmalu bay psbalay uuda dha mi pddayaw. Kngkawas 2011, Karimohu homung Cyokoku cida tuhuy Cyoka Jnmin Konghkwo psdhu matas quri knou bay knbarux hbangan mi tocu patas pnsdhuwan, Cyoka Jnmin Konghkwo u snpeyyah niyi tumal Ocbek qqpahun quri gasoring. Muda tndxral Ocbek ka 'Cyokoku-Tukcka Asia' gasu ida nkiya kwantaw u mndungus bay pnspuwan dha smnalu, kngkawas nduray niyi u wada kawas kawas mrana ka nngalan dha uri. Kngkawas 2012 wada phyuwan ka mphaqun skori snpeyyah Nawoi (Ocbek) dhuq Tyeyncin (Cyokoku) quri ppanan skoki mapa qqiya, nxan daw muda keykaku ka dhiya u malun dha pdhuq Sanghay mi Kwangco ka ppanan qqiya skoki niyi Dungan. Kiya mi Tasekan (Ocbek) dhuq Orumuci (Cyokoku) na ppanan sediq skoki u wada tnbarah pstalang dungan. Kiya u saya pa, muda bsiyaq kngkawas smatang mpsalu phiyu Cyokoku-Circis-Ocbek Stan ppanan kisya ka keykaku u, alaw quri qnlhangan Circis mniq kngkawas 2012 ka ini sruwa kiya ka wada thtur da. Knghkawas 2012, Cyokoku mi Ocbek ddha dha mawyio dhuq 28.75 oku pila Amirika, wada smmalu rikisi knou bay na. Jnwen cyawryo u kndudul mnddungus, kngkawas 2005 phiyu Tasekan Kongcu sweyweyn. Tu2 'Kongc sweyweyn' u mphiyun dungan. Qnlhangan Ocbek keyngkyo sweyco mnquri sediq Cyokoku tmiyu rmngaw, tndxral Ocbek u mnkari knou bay tura so qqiya tukubeycu Cyokoku na suru wenwu. Cyokoku mi Ocbek na pysan tubaraw kyoiku ryosweysng knhbaraw u wada kawas kawas kndudul mrana uri. Mniq Sincyang Uighur Cucucyu u ya bay niqan 3 knbkiyan sediq na Ocbek joku kndusan. Snadu Tiyu Rbawan Orimpiko undokay: 9 King 7 Ging 17 dong 26 snadu (Asia tu10, Knlangan tu bukuy 20). Misan Orimpiko undokay: 1 King (Asia tu5, Qnlangan tubrah 25). Asia undokay: 53 King 81Ging 78 Dong 212 snadu (Tu12). Rbawas Orimpiko undokay: 4 King 4 Ging 4 Dong 12 Snadu (Asia tu10, Qnlangan tu 50 sngari) Asia Kcka Sapah Undokay: 13 King Asia Kcka Sapah Undokay: 13 King 18 Ging 21Dong tu52 snadu (Tu10). Asia Misan Undokay: 1 King 2 Ging 5 Dong (Tu6). Rbawan Mbbiyax Olimpiko undokay: 2Ging 5 Dong (Asia Tu13, Qnlangan tu61) Qnlangan undokay: 1 King 1 Ging 1 Dong (Asia tu11, qnlangan tu60). Asia Mbbiyax Undokay: 3 Dong (Tu20). Asia Uyi Undokay: 4 King 5 Ging 12 Dong 21 snadu (Tu8).

= Uzbekistan = Gaga kska Yacow ka Uzbekistan, 41 00 N, 64 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 447,400 sq km(hangan na o Tg57) (knlbanga dxgal o 425,400 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 22,000 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 29,473,614 hiyi. Gaga Tashkent ka poso alang paro, jiyax 1 idas 9 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Uzbekistan ga wada sogan 62.60% ka dxgal qpahan, 7.70% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 29.70% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Shavkat Mirziyoyev, pnaah hngkawas2016 idas 12 jiyax 14pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' = Ocbek = Ocbek Konghkwo (Kari Ocbek ji Rating: O'zbekiston Respoblikasi, ji Sirir: Ўзбекистон Республикаси), splawa dha Ocbek, kiya ka wa mniq Tokcka na qnlhangan kcka dxral, kngkawas 1991 snpeyyah mneyyah Soryeyn dokorico. Toiwil honac Ocbek o tohoy Torkmen mslotoc, tohonac o tohoy Afghan mslotoc, tonarac o tohoy Tajik mi Kyrgyz mslotoc, todaya mi toiwil o msdalih Kazakh, kiya ka knkana qnlangan 2 msdha qnlhangan kcka dxral ori (taxa ka Liectensten), cbiyaw o splawa dha Nniqan Samarhan, yayong Sir mi yayong Ymo ka lmiho knkana tndxral dha, soto o wa mniq rboq dxral Fergana, kiya ka knkana Tokcka Asia tqapor balay nniqan. Ocbek ka knkana qnlangan to6 knbeyhing bay pnyahan wata, kiya o to7 knbeyhing bay pnyahan king knkana knlangan ori. Rikisi Poso tyawmo: Rikisi Ocbek. Kngkawas 870 dhoq kngkawas 1212, tohonac yayong Sir nniqan Sankako co na tnslotoc sediq Ukos Ahocsiyabo ka pnhiyo Klahan caw (Heyhan) wangcaw qmlahang. Qmlahang tobokoy diyax cida (12 th dhoq 13 th) spoda Siryaw ka kmlawa qmlahang. Kngkawas 1212 dhoq kngkawas 1220, Hhwaccmosa caw (kngkawas 1194 dhoq kngkawas 1220 idas 12) mniq kngkkawas 1210 prading qmlahang Samarhan. Kngkawas 1220 dhoq kngkawas 1388, wada yahan knrmox ngalan Monggolia Tikwo, psnakan ngalan Kingcang Hankwo mi Cahotay Hankwo. Bokoy daw wada yahan knrmox ngalan Teymor. Kngkawas 16 th pnrdingan kngkawas 1506, bokong mpdodol sediq Ocbek Sipanni mqori tohonac Samarhan nniqan qnpahan pnwalang. Pspoxon niya ka Teymor wangcaw. 17 th, wada ptalax mkdha sonca Pohara Hankwo mi Siwa Hankwo. 18 th, dokorico ka Hawhan Hankwo. Kngkawas 1873, Pohara Hankwo na Mancit Wangcaw o wada yahan knrmox ngalan Rossia Tikwo, wada mnsdan qnlhangan dha. Kngkawas 1918, wada pknglan Tocyeystan Sowiay Syakay Ciyi Konhkwo. Kngkawas 1920 heytay tanah Soryeyn o knrmox ngalan dha ka Siwa Hankwo, pspoxan ka Abod Arahan (Kngkawas 1918 dhoq kngkawas 1920 mniq qmlahang) qnlhangan niya, wada pkngaton ka Siwa Hankwo. Soryeyn ka mniq bokoy dmowi tndxral dha phiyo Hwaccmo Sowiay Jnmin Konghkwo (qtayi ka Hwaccmo), kngkawas 1924, mrrhak ka Hwaccmo Sowiay Jnmin Konghkwo, tndxral niya o pspowan Ocbek mi Torkmen ddha tomal Soryeyn konghkwo. Mntna kngkawas idas 10, ida ndoma Pohara Hankwo mi ndoma Siwa Hankwo ka wada msopo, phiyo Ocbek Sowiay Jnmin Konghkwo, kiya mi tomal Soryeyn. Kngkawas 1991 idas 8 diyax 31 pkla kari dokorico, knpriyox hangan qnlhangan Ocbek Konghkwo, mntna kngkawas idas 12 diyax 21 tomal Dokorico Qnlhangan Kwosyey. Ceng-c Binaw, snpeyyah Kari Moho mniq kngkawas 1991 phyowan dhoq saya pa, wada mnoo prbaon ka diyax snpngan qpahon niya soto, mnniq kngkawas 1995, diyax pnrbawan niya ka kngkawas 2002, kngkawas 2007 mi kngkawas 2015 ka mnlotoc mangal soto dongan, dhoq kngkawas 2016 idas 9 ka wada mrdang. Kngkawas 2002 ka soto seyngkyo cida pa wada mnhdo seyngkyo tobaraw giying mi toroma giying na gying ori, binaw o oka hatay tang ka cida moda niyi. So kiya, kmita ka kwoci kwancaweyn so niya moda seyngkyo wa oxay mndongos bay ooda minco, mniq minco cso o mntocay cngti ori. Kngkawas 2016 idas 12 diyax 4, Ocbek o moda snpeyyah mnrdang ka Kari Moho mn1 soto seyngkyo, cngri Mirceyayeho ka mangal borah soto. Sing-ceng cyo-hwa Poso tyawmo: Ocbek sngcng cyohwa. Ocbek pa knkana o psnakan 1 cosyaso, 12 ka co mi 1 cocokonghkwo. Kcka 12 co hangan dha ka spatas troma niyi: Ti-ri Poso tyawmo: Lnlingay Ocbek. Qtayi: Patas bnkowan alang mkbrnox Ocbek. Alaw ka mssiyaw qnlhangan niya o to bay qnlhangan kcka dxral kana, so kiya Ocbek o kiya ka knkana qnlangan 2 msdha qnlhangan kcka dxral ori (taxa ka Liectensten). Knkana knrbangan dxral o 44.74 knbkiyan pinhwang km. Knkana hniwan tndxral qnlhangan pa tonarac ka tobaraw ni toiril ka troma. Dxral brnox o knkana knrbangan niya 80%, to bay wa mniq toiwil na Kcrkomo bnaqi bboyo. Tonarac mi tohonac o mnddwiyaq Tyeynsan mi Csar-Ddwiyaq Alay na kngaho toiwil, wa kcka niya ka bay hhangan rboq dxral Fergana mi rboq dxral Crahosang. Kcka tndxral qnlhangan nniqan ida nkiya coweyn mttoko mndongos bay dxral ayo. Poso bay yayong o niqan yayong Amo, yayong Sir mi yayong Cerahosang. Mnkndngowan bay tarosing kngkkarac. Pndkanan kntlxan idas 7 pa 25℃-32℃, kntlxan diyan tohonac o kntto dhoq 40℃; pndkanan kntlxan idas 1 o －6～－33℃, knskoy karac todaya o －38℃. Pndkanan qsiya qnyoxan ka dxral brnox o 80-200 hawmi, nniqan lmiqo o 1000 hawmi, to bay wa mniq misan mi srwasaw cida. Nniqan doma todaya o msdalih Krmnan Ucilong. Tndxral qnlhangan o to bay wa mniq kcka Kcrkomo bnaqi bboyo. Knbaraw bay tndxral qnlhangan o kaypa 4643 m na dodox dwiyaq Hacratsotan, kiya ka poso dodox todo dwiyaq Cisa. Keyjay Poso tyawmo: Keyjay Ocbek. Mntna oo bay dokorico kwosyey keyjayti, keyjay Ocbek mniq knpriyox keyjay ini kpiya knkawas o wada mlih, dhoq kngkawas 1995 bokoy daw prading mtotoy da, wada so niyi mkmalo o snpeyyah dndolan knpriyox cngce prading pndongos. Keyjay ka ptora pqita knrana balay, mniq iyax kngkawas 1998 dhoq kngkawas 2003 kawas kawas mrana 4%, bokoy daw wada ini biyaw knrinah mrana dhoq 7%-8%. Spoda snpowan pnsliyan qnlangan pila cicin, kngkawas 2008 cida GDP Ocbek o kiya bay so mk2 knrana niya kngkawas 1995 (spoda pskingal neydang smpo). Kngkawas 2003 dhoq cida tongpongryo o ino qdhoq pndkanan 10%. Pndkanan sntkowan pila kngkawas sediq qnlhangan Ocbek o tikoh balay (Kngkawas 2006 spoda snpowan pila Amirika cida o 610 pila Amirika, spoda biyax mbari mhnok smpo o 2250 pila Amirika). So niyi o mniq kcka 209 qnlhangan o to169 bnkowan; mniq 12 kcka qnlhangan dokorico kwosyey pa, wana Kyrgyz mi Tajik na jncyon kokomin nngalan knkana ka mabang kntikoh dhiya (Kngkawas 2006). Pnyahan pkrana keyjay o to bay pssli qori qqiya ddiyon kddiyax. Qnlhangan dha saya daw kiya ka knkana qnlangan to6 knbeyhing bay pnyahan wata mi to2 knbeyhing bay coko wata, knkana qnlangan to7 knbeyhing pnyahan qnlhangan king. Kiya o qnlhangan dha pa kiya ka nniqan dha hiya stmanan bay gaso ida nkiya, mey, dong, gasoring, ging mi yo pnyahan qnlhangan. Cndoray hari niyi, soto Ocbek Mirceyayeho psdho matas posa kari, smkaol ida na qnlhangan jeyking yingkay hoko cosi Normamat Torsonoh ka Tasekan so qnlhangan keyjay congcyo cyocang; psdhowan ida Tasekan co qnlhanga jeyking congcyo cyocang Alimojan Fayicipayeho ka qnlhangan jeyking yingkay hoko cosi. Snpowan knhbrawan hiyi sediq Poso tyaw: Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Ocbek. Qtayi: Ocbek minjoko Ocbek o knhbrawan balay hiyi sediq mniq Tokcka Asia na qnlhangan, knkana knhbrawan hiyi sediq o 3200 knbkiyan hiyi, ya bay dmka knhbrawan hiyi sediq Tokcka Asia. Pnspowan kngkawas knhbrawan hiyi sediq Ocbek o wakay balay: 34.1% hiyi sediq o ici khrinas 14 kngkawas (Snpowan kngkawas 2008). Poso balay minjoko Ocbek ka Ocbek minjoko (80%), doma minjoko o niqan Tajik joko (5%), Rossia joko (2%), Karakarpak joko (2.2%), Korkoc joko (1%), Kazakh joko (3.9%) mi sediq Korean (0.7%). Ocbek o qolong niqan 10% ka biyax mpqpah niya ka wa qnlhangan icil qmpah (Poso niya balay o wa mniq Rossia mi Kazakh) mi doma qnlhangan icil. Hmrinas 15 kngkawas ka sediq odan Ocbek (Snpowan kngkawas 2003) na mkla smpo patas ryo ka 99.3％, alaw mniq Soryeyn jidayi o dmodol bay qori kyoiko. Knodos dha sediq Ocbek o snaw ka 66 kngkawas, qridin ka 72 kngkawas. Alang mkbrnox Snlhayan snhiyan Poso tyawmo: Snlhayan snhiyan Ocbek. Islam kyo ka poso balay slhayan snhiyan Ocbek, mniq jidayi Soryeyn (kngkawas 1921-kngkawas 1991) hmtor kana ooda snlhayan. Piyo keyngkyo congsin mniq kngkawas 2009 cida pkla kingal patas, snlohay moslim ka Ocbek o niqan 93.3%. Kngkawas 2014, Rossia Cng pnrholan na koriscyang o 7% hiyi knhbrawan. Kngkawas 1990 snpowan brah o niqan 93,000 hiyi sediq Yodaya mnniq qnlhangan Ocbek. Kari Poso tyawmo: Kari Ocbek. Kari sdowi seyho o kari Ocbek mnkcka Tocyey joko na cida kari Kroro, kiya mi tohoy kari Uighor o niqan mtndadal pnloban dha. Kndadax kngkawas 1992 dhoq cida skari Ocbek ji o dmowi bntasan kari Latin ji. Mniq 1920 cida brah, kari Ocbek o spatas patas daw splawa dha Torki (toiwil sediq tmkarac o splawa dha kari Cahotay), dmowi Persiati matas. Kngkawas 1926, bnkowan ji Latin o wada ddolon Ocbek, kiya mi mniq kngkawas 1930 jiday moda mnoo snbrahan. Mniq kngkawas 1940, ji Sirir o spoda dndolan seyho Soryeyn, ida ddiyon dhoq mkrhak ka Soryeyn. Kngkawas 1993, Ocbek o tnbrinah knpriyox dmowi ji Latin (Ji kari Ocbek). Ji niyi o mniq kngkawas 1996 wada sbrahan, kndadax kngkawas 2000 cida ida stosa mniq sapah pyasan. Sapah pyasan o wana tmasa ji Latin kari Ocbek, ana so kari Ocbek ji Sirir saya o wada plaxan mniq ddiyon ppatas bntasan seyho, binaw ida sdowi bay knoo bay sinbong mi wangcan. Poso bay nniqan dmowi kari Tajik o mniq dxral 2 hbaraw nniqan Tajik joko: Phara mi Samarhan. Ocbek o niqan hmrinas 80 knbkiyan hiyi sediq o dmowi kari Kazakh ori. Bongka Poso tyawmo:Bongka Ocbek. Qtayi: Kraso mi Ocbek Islam kyo. Ocbek o niqan knlbangan bay minjoko mi bongka, poso minjoko ka Ocbek joko. Kngkawas 1995, ya bay niqan 71% sediq Ocbek pa Ocbek joko kiya. Poso minjoko o niqan sediq Rossia (8%), sediq Tajik (3-4.7%), sediq Kazakh (4%), sediq Tatan (2.5%), kiya mi sediq Karakarpak (2%). Knhbrawan hiyi oxay Ocbek joko na sediq o wiso kndodol mlih, alaw sediq Ocbek snpeyyah coxan Soryeyn doma nniqan dxral tbrinah miyah, sediq Rossia mi minjoko ini khbaraw sediq pa wiso kndodol mlatac icil. Mniq kngkawas 1991 cida dokorico ka Ocbek, dsediq o slhbon Islam Weyncyawco Coyi ka mpkrana knkana Ocbek. Dhoq kngkawas 1994 cida, niqan dmka knhbrawan hiyi Moslim ka Ocbek, mniq kcka snpowan seyho pa, Moslim mniq Ocbek o ini khbaraw sediq ka balay bay mkla pnsltodan snlhayan snhiyan. Binaw, jinjya Islan kyo (Moslim) mniq dxral nniqan hiya o moro snlhayan pnsltodan o wiso kndodol mrana. Inggako Poso tyawmo: Inggako Ocbek Tokcka Asia kotyeyn inggako o splawa dha Sasemokamo, kiya o mniq 16 th thiti mniq Pohara mtqita, cida o alang mkbrnox niyi ka soho dxral nniqan dha hiya. Sasemokamo mi Yasaypayjanmokamo mi Uighoymokamo o malo balay pnloban dha. Sasemokamo knkana o 6 ini pntna inggako tyawso, mntna bay Persia pnsltodan inggako. Smsong diyax sngayan Poso tyawmo: Smsong diyax sngayan Ocbek. Bnkowan diyax ddaon Idas 1 diyax 1: Bnkowan Qiyax Ddaon Smsong Borah Kngkawas (Yangi Yil Bayrami). Idas 1 diyax 14: Diyax Qmlahang Cokwo (Vatan Himoyachilari koni). Idas 3 diyax 8: Smsong diyax Qnlangan Qqridin. (Xalqaro Xotin-Qizlar koni). Idas 1 diyax 21: Smsong Diyax Navroc (Navro'z Bayrami) Idas 5 diyax 9: Diyax Mbiyax (Xotira va Qadirlash koni). Idas 9 diyax 1: Diyax Dokorico (Mostaqillik koni). Idas 10 diyax 1: Smsong Diyax Mptosa (O'qitovchi va Morabbiylar). Idas 12 diyax 8: Diyax Keyngpo (Konstitotsiya koni). Bnkowan diyax ddaon Islam To1 diyax Idas Sanwaro (Idas 10 diyax 1): Smsong Diyax Kaycay (Ro'za hayiti). To10 diyax Idas Torheyco (Idas 12 diyax 10): Smsong diyax Korpang (Qorbon hayiti). Mmahan mi ooqan Poso tyawmo: Mmahan mi ooqan Ocbek. Mntna knoo bay qnlhangan, wada dndolan dxral nniqan nongyey ka mmahan mi ooqan Ocbek. Ocbek pa niqan knoo bay pnhoma pnwalang, niqan pnyahan knoo bay pang mi bicon, tokobeyco niya mmahan mi ooqan Ocbek pa 'Mttoko balay bicon'. Kiya Dongan o, hiyi miric ka oqon balay Ocbek ori. Mako oqon Ocbek ka idaw qrapon, ida so idaw balay, pnrmaxan smmalo wawa mi ningjing tnlmowan mi tama pixil, oqan balay knbeyhing sqrasan pnsliyan. Niqan Dongan ka kingal oqon mdongos bay rmirih Ocbek ka shorpa, spoda hiyi miric mi sama pnspowan smmalo. Ratyawc ka kingal klowanan ooqon bicon, malo ngalan poso oqan; lnhowan nodoh ori ka qtan bay ooqan Ocbek. Waycyaw Poso tyawmo: Waycyaw Ocbek. Pnloban dha tohoy Cyoka Jnmin Konghkwo Poso tyawmo: Pn. Tna mniq 2000 kngkawas brah cida, spoda elo rodan cbiyaw, Cyokoko mi Ocbek o tna niqan ploban dha da. Kngkawas 1992 idas 1, ddha qnlhangan omoda pwalok cyeyncyaw, babaw niya daw ida malo bay pnloban dha mi mdho bay mrana, bokong baraw o kndodol malo pnloban. Kngkawas 2010 o Hocintaw ka mn1 mosa qmita Ocbek , kngkawas 2011, kngkawas 2012 Karimoho soto o mn2 mosa mita Cyokoko daw, kngkawas 2013 idas 9 Sicinping ka splawa dha miyah Ocbek moda kwoso homong. Ddha dha o wada mrana bay psnhiyi ka qori seyji dha, seyho dha o mbiyax balay sndho pddkoh qmlahang pskingal mi mndongos dxral qnlhangan dha; anjeyn msopo qmpah o niqan bay pndongos niya ori, Cyokoko mi Ocbek mniq knbeyhing ddaon seyho o wada knmalo bay psbalay ooda dha mi pddayaw. Kngkawas 2011, Karimoho homong Cyokoko cida tohoy Cyoka Jnmin Konghkwo psdho matas qori knoo bay knbarox hbangan mi toco patas pnsdhowan, Cyoka Jnmin Konghkwo o snpeyyah niyi tomal Ocbek qqpahon qori gasoring. Moda tndxral Ocbek ka 'Cyokoko-Tokcka Asia' gaso ida nkiya kwantaw o mndongos bay pnspowan dha smnalo, kngkawas ndoray niyi o wada kawas kawas mrana ka nngalan dha ori. Kngkawas 2012 wada phyowan ka mphaqon skori snpeyyah Nawoi (Ocbek) dhoq Tyeyncin (Cyokoko) qori ppanan skoki mapa qqiya, nxan daw moda keykako ka dhiya o malon dha pdhoq Sanghay mi Kwangco ka ppanan qqiya skoki niyi Dongan. Kiya mi Tasekan (Ocbek) dhoq Oromoci (Cyokoko) na ppanan sediq skoki o wada tnbarah pstalang dongan. Kiya o saya pa, moda bsiyaq kngkawas smatang mpsalo phiyo Cyokoko-Circis-Ocbek Stan ppanan kisya ka keykako o, alaw qori qnlhangan Circis mniq kngkawas 2012 ka ini srowa kiya ka wada thtor da. Knghkawas 2012, Cyokoko mi Ocbek ddha dha mawyio dhoq 28.75 oko pila Amirika, wada smmalo rikisi knoo bay na. Jnwen cyawryo o kndodol mnddongos, kngkawas 2005 phiyo Tasekan Kongco sweyweyn. To2 'Kongc sweyweyn' o mphiyon dongan. Qnlhangan Ocbek keyngkyo sweyco mnqori sediq Cyokoko tmiyo rmngaw, tndxral Ocbek o mnkari knoo bay tora so qqiya tokobeyco Cyokoko na soro wenwo. Cyokoko mi Ocbek na pysan tobaraw kyoiko ryosweysng knhbaraw o wada kawas kawas kndodol mrana ori. Mniq Sincyang Uighor Cococyo o ya bay niqan 3 knbkiyan sediq na Ocbek joko kndosan. Snado Tiyo Rbawan Orimpiko ondokay: 9 King 7 Ging 17 dong 26 snado (Asia to10, Knlangan to bokoy 20). Misan Orimpiko ondokay: 1 King (Asia to5, Qnlangan tobrah 25). Asia ondokay: 53 King 81Ging 78 Dong 212 snado (To12). Rbawas Orimpiko ondokay: 4 King 4 Ging 4 Dong 12 Snado (Asia to10, Qnlangan to 50 sngari) Asia Kcka Sapah Undokay: 13 King Asia Kcka Sapah Undokay: 13 King 18 Ging 21Dong to52 snado (To10). Asia Misan Undokay: 1 King 2 Ging 5 Dong (To6). Rbawan Mbbiyax Olimpiko ondokay: 2Ging 5 Dong (Asia To13, Qnlangan to61) Qnlangan ondokay: 1 King 1 Ging 1 Dong (Asia to11, qnlangan to60). Asia Mbbiyax Undokay: 3 Dong (To20). Asia Uyi Undokay: 4 King 5 Ging 12 Dong 21 snado (To8).
